intent: Explore "Generative geometry stills" to express tension between machine autonomy and human longing.

researchTrail.borrow: Borrow one structural tactic from Digital & Contemporary Art Gallery London I Asprey Studio.

method: Generate 4 iterations with escalating constraint pressure, then self-critique and select one finalist.

selfCritique.notes: Selected version with strongest visual thesis and least derivative structure.

finalOutput.rationale: Best balance of concept clarity and stylistic identity under constraints.
